properties.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley; Western El Paso County
properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 10:10AM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
A passing Canadian cold front is producing strong winds across
portions of southern New Mexico and far west Texas with winds
gusting around 40 to 50 mph over a few locations. Winds will be
especially strong along western facing mountain slopes. The
combination of strong winds and rain and snow may create
dangerous driving conditions.

NWSheadline: COLD FRONT BRINGING HIGH WINDS ACROSS SOUTHERN NEW MEXICO AND WEST TEXAS
